=========
 Changes
=========


1.2.0 (2023-05-05)
==================

- Add support for Python 3.8, 3.9, 3.10 and 3.11.


1.1.0 (2018-09-13)
==================

- Add support for Python 3.7.

- Add support for zope.schema 4.7.


1.0.0 (2017-04-26)
==================

- First PyPI release.
- Add support for Python 3.6.
- Remove backward compatibility exports.
